actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution extending the heartfelt sympathy of the Congress to the families and friends of the American military personnel who died in Iran on April 25, 1980, during the aborted mission to rescue the American hostages held in Iran.

summary.text: Expresses congressional condolences to the families and friends of the eight Americans who died in Iran on April 25, 1980, as result of an accidental collision during the mission to rescue the American hostages.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution extending the heartfelt sympathy of the Congress to the families and friends of the American military personnel who died in Iran on April 25, 1980, during the aborted mission to rescue the American hostages held in Iran.
